title: Mary Roach Discusses "Fuzz: When Nature Breaks the Law"
itunes:title: Mary Roach Discusses "Fuzz: When Nature Breaks the Law"
description:
In this episode of Stuff to Blow Your Mind, Robert and Joe welcome acclaimed science writer Mary Roach back to the show to discuss her new book "Fuzz: When Nature Breaks the Law."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
